meta.title: NeuralFit — Talk. Be heard. Get better.
meta.description: NeuralFit is the anonymous social app with a super-smart AI therapist and safe voice/video spaces. Join rooms, get AI-backed support, and grow with a community that cares.

hero.headline: Talk without the noise. Grow without the stigma.
hero.subheadline: NeuralFit blends anonymous voice rooms with an AI therapist that helps you reflect, learn, and move forward — faster than therapy alone.

features.title: AI Therapist that listens
features.desc: Evidence-based coaching, instant reflections, and personalized prompts.

features.title: Anonymous voice & text rooms
features.desc: Drop in, speak freely, or listen — anonymity is on by default.

features.title: Safe by design
features.desc: Built-in moderation and human support for tricky moments.

features.title: Actionable summaries
features.desc: Short takeaways and suggested next steps after every session.
